item.title: Timing
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (747)) // rune scimi here { PkingDelay = 5; actionTimer = 5; }

etc. down the line i have done this. but there are thousands of weapons.

if (UseBow) { inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; CheckArrows(); CalculateRange(); hitDiff = misc.random(30); } else { PkingDelay = 10; wepdelay = 10; }

i found out this code makes it so every weapon only hits that fast.
how can i code that so its more like if the pkind and wep delay is not up there it has 10 instead of having no timer?

Read full topic
